author: amos:ez.no
msg: # Note: The reason for the large commit was the lack of internet connection
#       during the weekend.
- Added member variable $debug to parser class which controls all debug output.
# All debug code is temporary.
- Added the last operator which is the conditional ?: operator.
A special parser was required for this operator to work out.
- Fixed all 'pre' operators (++, --, !, -) to not perform precedence check since
their behaviour is different than 'post' operators. Instead they are always
placed as parameter of the current operator.
- Moved operand handling to ezcTemplateParser::handleOperand instead of having
the same code scattered across parsers.
- Some changes to Operand elements:
* Operators can choose if the parametes should be merged with other operator.
* Added function for removing last parameter.
* Made the property operator (.) on the same precedence level as the array
- Fixed all atEnd() functions to not allow automatic finalizing of parsing if
the end is reached. This behaviour is controlled by a new parameter $finalize.
- Improved error reporting by showing the exact spot where the parsing failed.
- Added support for stopping parsing in the ezcTemplateExpressionParser
when it reaches an operator with a precedence that is lower than a given
threshold.
- Added support for function calls.
- Implemented support for escaping the block start marker to prevent it being
treated as a block but rather plain text.
- Added support for literal blocks.
- Implemented parsing of blocks and added proper nesting of them.
* Introduced new root element which is returned by the main parser instead
of an array of elements.
* Started implemenation of control structures, currently implemented foreach
loop.
